description: A pair of softshell pants suitable for almost any wintertime mountain activity? The Taiss Pro is inspired by the Base Jump Touring Pants and offers a full range of features without any compromises. It’s the right choice for ski touring, mountaineering and ice climbing. Developed for winter conditions, the brushed double-woven fabric is warmer and softer. At the same time, the material protects you from wind and wicks away moisture when you start breaking a sweat. Side zippers positioned at hip level provide extra ventilation when you need it. The pants have a cut with articulated knee panels for full freedom of movement, while removable suspenders give you extra support when you need it. Climbing harness-compatible pockets provide easy-access storage, and reinforced leg hems protect against ski edges and crampons. The Taiss Pro – a pair of softshell pants for all your technical wintertime activities.
name: Mammut Taiss Pro SO Pants, Long - Mens
